title: Santa Fe National Historic Trail: Learn About the Park
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park           Learn About the Park       EXPLORE the Santa Fe National Historic Trail through:  News - Look here for press releases, trail newsletters, and a blog: Crossing the Prairie Ocean: Conservation on the Santa Fe Trail - an essay written by Noah Schlager.   Photos & Multimedia - Public domain images, video and audio podcasts, and online exhibits are at your fingertips.   History & Culture - Discover Santa Fe Trail stories, exhibits, and in-depth research.   Kids & Youth - Earn your junior ranger badge or become a wagon master.   Management - Includes laws, policies, and a staff listing.
